## MapStateToProps type

State container state to component props mapper. See [Connect](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.connect.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MapStateToProps<State extends BaseState, StateProps extends object> = (state: State) => StateProps;
```
